name: Velocity 2X
overview: Velocity®2X blends two unique styles of fast-paced, frenetic gameplay into one incredible fun and challenging SF experience! BECOME A CERTIFIED BADASS Lt. Kai Tana, a former Test Pilot was captured by a race of hostile aliens. During her captivity, Kai’s body has undergone various cybernetic modifications. Freed by a precious ally, she must now use her new abilities and the teleporting power of her ship to evade the Vokh and free the universe from this dangerous threat.
